participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: down-to-earth and practical, Michael prefers the simplicity of quiet living over the hustle of urban environments.
participant_1.background: i'm a male. i have children and dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: adventurous and optimistic, Jessica loves exploring new places and embracing the excitement of city life.
participant_2.background: i recently moved to this country. i just moved into my first home. i already have stepchildren. i'm expecting triplets in three months.
